name: Shahida Alam
description: Good to cook for pulav, biryani etc. Very long grains after cooking. Taste is also good. Try rice from here you will buy.

name: Tamim Hasan
description: Long grains. Has a flavour. After cooking resulted in fine long grained rice and my biriyani turned out very nice. Satisfied.

name: Tanvir Malik
description: I bought this rice before and quality was good but a couple weeks ago I bought more and this time quality also good.

name: Radit Ahmed
description: Rice grains are long and cook fluffy. It lacks any basmati fragrance. Quite good rice for ordinary pulav.
